name: Home Improvement: Power Tool Pursuit!
overview: Power Tool Pursuit! Handyman extraordinaire Tim Taylor has just received the greatest honor any real man could hope for: Binford has named its new line of Taylor-Turbo Power Tools after him! But before Tim can unveil these monuments to his masculinity, industrial spies pilfer the prototypes from the "Tool Time" set! Now Tim's grunting man, and he's out to track down the tool-swiping punks by himself! - The Heartiest Hardware! Use 8 unstoppable, ultra-macho tools! - The Weirdest, Wildest Worlds! Battle 22 types of special effects robots through 4 of the craziest TV studios ever! - The Gang's All Here! Al and the Taylor boys are on the scene to help Tim with his quest!
